title: User-Centric Privacy Controls – User-Friendly Privacy Settings Interface
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want a simple and clear privacy settings interface so that I can easily manage my data privacy and feel secure while using the ALFRED system.

title: Adaptive System Configuration – Guided Onboarding with Voice Assistance
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want a guided onboarding process with voice assistance so that I can easily set up and configure ALFRED without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to connect seamlessly with my wearable health monitor so that I can efficiently manage my health and receive timely reminders for medication and alerts in case of emergencies.

title: Voice-Driven Health Management
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to use voice commands to set medication reminders and manage my health schedule so that I can maintain my independence and manage my health efficiently without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Simple Voice Feedback Collection
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to provide feedback to ALFRED using simple voice prompts, so that I can easily share my experiences and suggestions without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Accessibility Compliance Assurance – User Testing for Diverse Abilities
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want the ALFRED system to be easy to navigate and understand, so that I can maintain my independence without feeling overwhelmed by complex technology.
